Subject: Not receiving Email Alerts
Description: Hello, need assistance with our SMTP setup. Not able to receive email notifications.
Solution_Comment__c:
Customer confirmed it works with their new gmail account.
also tried:
- updated the Emails Server settings and provided a documentation for O365 on how it should be setup
- enabled File Tracing and made some minor adjustments to some other Global Settings
- configured the 2 CAP policies
- configured the alerts
